A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a good movie. I'm surprised and more than a little irritated at the people posting 1/2 a star just because they are disappointed about the direction this movie went in. I grew up with Star Wars\,--I loved it as a child. Was this movie perfect? Of course not! But it was full of heart and extremely entertaining\, and it  doesn't deserve a 53% approval. Grow up people!
